bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause
bibl.note: Focuses on new information about the development of Coptic and its relationship to the milieu of the Egyptian temples.
BAGNALL Roger S., Linguistic Change and Religious Change: Thinking about the Temples of the Fayoum in the Roman Period.

Gawdat GABRA (Ed.), Christianity and Monasticism in the Fayoum Oasis. Essays from the 2004 International Symposium of the Saint Mark Foundation and the Saint Shenouda the Archimandrite Coptic Society in Honor of Martin Krause (Cairo - New York, 2005) pp. 11-19, 2 figg.
